document_data.name: Harbor Tower (Suzail)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Harbor Tower''' was one of the garrison buildings staffed with [[Purple Dragons]] in [[Suzail]], the capital city of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Location: Suzail's Harbor Tower rose above the waters of the [[Royal Docks]] at the [[Citadel of the Purple Dragons]], overlooking [[Dragonmere]]. The Harbor Tower was the westernmost tower of said fortification.{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|65}}
document_data.Description: The tower's garrison was equipped with war [[horn]]s that signaled danger or responded to other war horns blaring from the castle, gates, or other fortifications of the capital. The towers of the Citadel, including the Harbor Tower, were considered to a part of the Royal Docks and were under the direct command of the Royal Admiral of Cormyr, Admiral [[Hazen Kelafin]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
